dc_title_s: Ghana - Geo-located Solar Stations connected to the grid (2014)
dc_description_s: This dataset consists of grid connected solar installations. Their installed capacities in kilowatts (kW) are also provided. This dataset was last updated in June 2014. Citation: Ghana Energy Commission & Negawatt challenge. The World Bank and the International Finance Corporation, collectively the World Bank Group (WBG) strives to enhance public access to and use of data that can support development impact.
